By date of the last operation
Delete account %s? All transactions on this account will be deleted.
Click the Back button to exit drag mode
You must specify the account name
You must specify the account currency
Please select text for the marker in the message body
Account balance differs from that specified in the SMS by %s. Create the correction transaction?
Account balance differs from that specified in the SMS
Account %s balance differs from that specified in the SMS by %s. Press to adjust.
You must specify the account to be debited

Number of digits after decimal point
Location permission is nedded to obtain transaction coordinates. Click Next, and allow access to location data.
Create a transaction with payment of interest on the loan?
"Read SMS" permission nedded to import SMS. Click Next, and allow access to messages data.
SMS markers or senders were created, but message receiving is not allowed. Click Next and allow work with messaging.
Split of transfers is not supported
Total sum at the beginning of the month
Total sum at the end of the month
Clear plan for the current month?
Backups are created automatically and stored to the memory card in Fingen/\Backup
Restore database from the file? The program will be restarted.
External storage access permission is needed to backup and restore DB. Click Next, and allow access to external storage.
Please map file fields to Fingen entities
External storage access permission is needed to import/export data. Click Next, and allow access to external storage.
External storage access permission is needed to import/export data. Click Next, and allow access to external storage.
An error occurred during the import process
An error occurred during the export process
Fingerprint is not recognized. Try again
Tab that will be open when the application starts
If all markers specified in "Autocreation Prerequisites" are found in the SMS
Compare account balance with the balance in SMS
On this screen you can change transaction properties. A transaction is any movement of your money (income, expense or transfer)
Click to change the date of the transaction
Click to change the time of the transaction
Select the account that receives funds
Select the account from which the funds are debited
Select the account that receives funds
Enter the payee name. Swipe left to go to the transfer mode
Enter the payer name. Swipe left to go to the transfer mode
Select the account for depositing funds. Swipe right to go to the income/expense mode
Choose the transaction category from list
When transferring funds between accounts in different currencies, destination account currency is used for this field. Editing the field will result in automatic exchange rate change.
Currency exchange rate change will result in automatic change of the sum in destination account currency
This screen is for editing account properties
Enter a unique name for the account
Click to select currency. In the same dialog you can create a new currency
Enter the last 4 digits of the card number (optional)
Check, if you want to hide the account from the list. You also need to uncheck the "Show closed accounts" option in Preferences

Thank you for your purchase! To build graphical reports, go to the "Transactions" tab, pull up the bottom panel and click Charting. Reports are based on the transactions displayed in the list, taking into account all of the filters.
Allows to keep records on different devices
Camera access is required to display camera preview
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission
You can edit credentials later in Preferences

To download list of products from receipts:

    1. Install the application "Проверка касcового чека" (author of АО ГНИВЦ).

    2. Register in it using your mobile phone number and get the code by SMS.

    3. Enter the phone number and code in the form below.

    4. Tap "Save".
